author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
OMG! Itne saare memoirs! Aisa lgra hai asli zindagi toh tune jii hai campus mein!!
I remember when I first met you in the elections. Mein GH mein campaign krne aaya tha..pr vahan pe unfortunate events ke karan i couldn't. Toh mene GH se umeed hi chodh di thi..ki chlo GH toh jaane do. Pr 22 votes le aayi thi mere liye akeli...voh bhi tb jb poora GH was thinking otherwise. Mein aaj bhi sochta hun ki Why you had faith in me? But i was glad, when you decided to even join my team. Tb laga ki haan she genuinely want to uplift our sports culture... Bss uske baad toh kya hi nikla poora saal...tum teeno ke bharose hi nikla. Kitni bakchodiyian ki...mera bday tk mana liya :) Thanks a lot for that. I'll never forget that bday. Shuru mein mujhe lagta tha ki tu bss harr ek chiz ko counter krti hai. Ki you always like to choose the untreaded path. Shyd isiliye maybe u supported me in the elections :p....Pr, fir i realised ki you're just different. I believe you're the most intriguing psychological personality I've ever met. You're a case study in itself :p pr it's good..that you don't fear doing social experiments. Mein hmesha terese jb bhi baat krta tha...itna jyada cautious hoke baat krta tha ki pata nhi kisi baat ka bura na lag jaaye tujhe :p kabhi bura lag gya aur dilpe leke baith gyi tu baat...kya pata fir kisi din chalte chalte dhakka dede...aur agle din khabar aaye-'gaadi ke neeche aakr hui maut, iit ke student ki' :p:p:p Darr darr ke hi raha hun mein terese poora saal :p Pr chill hai.... now you're leaving..i'll feel campus a little safer :p lol...just kidding. Enjoy yrr!! Live your life to the fullest!!
author: Jaspreet  Singh

Aur pata nhi kyu mujhe feel aati hai....ki apan campus ke baad bhi kaafi milenge :) Vese abhi toh 1 saal aur hai...aur khoob bakchodiyian krenge :)
Aise hi hasste muskurate rehna :) logon ki taang kheechne mein toh tu maahir ho hi gya hai. Bss kahin prank videos na banane lag jaana youtube pe :p

text:
I've met you, still I haven't seen you on the other side of the poker table. Maybe you just started learning :p
i remember 1st year mein tu bss apne bed pe taange fold krke apne bed table pe dabba rakhke padhta rehta tha...bina kabhi pen paper uthaye full-full marks le ata tha. tbse hi i knew..yeh high-level banda hai isse bachhke rho. pr teri almirah ka khazana, mujhe terese door kaise rakh skta tha :p bhot bhot zyada khaya yrr mene teri almirah ke snacks. uske udhaar mein zindagi bhar ni chuka paunga :) tu aisa banda hai...jisne CSE dept ho ya intern ho ya placements,.. sabko bola "This is Kishan macho...Bade aaram se" :D minimal efforts ke saath chaapna koi aapse seekhe :) bss aakhri mein toh yhi kahunga ki bhool matt jaana..kabhi koi jaspreet hua krta tha. duauon mein yaad rakhna. bhagwan kre tu duniya ki uchayiyon ko choohe. sundarr si gharwali mile aur mere jaise pyaare pyaare bacche hon tere :)

I wish I knew you more, pr I'm happy atleast we met. Maybe down the line, we'll meet someday :)

text:
Mayank Mayank Mayank
tera first impression on me was... bhot high level banda. last moment mein padhke A grade, sophisticated, saaf-safai rakhne vaala, daddyji ke saath peg lagane vaala XD pr first year mein interact krte krte...i got to know your dark side XD first aur second year toh poora tera sahare hi padhe hain. My favourite thing about you..tu kabhi mana ni krta tha padhane se. chahe paper ke adhe ghante pehle hi aajaun mein tere paas XD. you were like aa chal baith mein padhata hun. pr fir dheere dheere apna contact kamm hota gya...pata ni kyu :( maybe apan dono busy busy rehne lage...aur dono hi department se door hote gye.. :D pr you will always be in my heart as the sweetest boy who lived in 3-top :) milenge yrr kabhi, saath mein drink krne ka sapna apna adhoora reh gya :D take care yr. Adios )

author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
PART-1
YoYo Neha!!
I heard your name for the first time in my first year itself, after InterIIT. I heard ki there's a girl who has become the Volley girl's team captain. I was like respect++. I expected a lot from you, there and then. I imagined you to be a perfect leader as well as top-notch performer. I thought tabhi koi 1st year mein captain bann skta hai. (Pata hai, even before coming to iitk, i thought mein itni achi football khelta hun, kya pata vahan jaake mein seedha captain hi bann jaunga. pr yahan aake pata chla ki abhi bhot kuch seekhna hai zindagi mein :p) And, fir aaya suraj. usne bataya thoda thoda about you, saal bhar. You might know hum roommates the aur dono sports mein bhi the.. baatein bhi khoob krte the practice se aake..raat raat bhar :p. Pr fir i got to know the reality... Completely disappointing(i thought in my mind). pr thoda thoda doubt fir bhi reh gya tha mann mein. Ki kya pata you might be different, maybe it's only the way you talk to suraj. Maybe academically, i thought we are more or less same. Toh i sometimes tried to talk to you in the department as well...but you were maybe too shy to talk to. (though it was more contrary to my expectations). I remember once, in L-4, I entered the MTH302 class from back door, saw you sitting in last row of that first section and sat next to you. Hoping maybe today we can break the ice, hoping you were more chill and cool. Pr sadly, nobody talked. Then, i stopped expecting anything from you. And by the 2nd year InterIIT, I always used to hear ki volley girls practice knre ni aati, captain khud ni aati..and many more. Fir uske baad toh, somehow I started hating you. Thinking you are just privileged, you just got captaincy by luck. Moreover you're spoiling the sport and setting a bad example for juniors to come. Fir toh you were like mujhe tera chehra dekhke hi gussa aata tha. Then in 3rd year, when I became the GenSec, I was like ki iss baar toh Volley girls team ko chodunga nhi...bilkul fraud nhi marne dunga. peeche hi padd jaunga. That time, you were the ex-captain and dadu was the captain. I always feared ki dadu bholi bhaali si hai..but tu use bhi bigaad degi. Then, i remember ek din notes lene ke bahane mein library mein aaya tha(probably pehli baar lib aaya hounga uss saal mein). Mera uss time bhi intention tha ki tujhe thoda tight krun ki practice vgera pe aaya kr. Pr tune uss time kuch toh aisa palat ke jawab diya tha..i remember ki voh seedha aise dil ko cheer ke nikal gya tha. Uss vakt you made it a war :p Kitne dinon tk mein pareshan raha tha ki yeh...kal ki aayi ladki..jo practice tk ni krti, usne mujhe aisa bol kaise diya :p This was just one case...which built hatred for you. pr suraj somehow thoda smjhata rehta tha mujhe ki voh pagal hai psycho hai...pr vaise achi hai. I was always like ki teri aankhon pe abhi pyaar ki patti hai..koi na bete baad mein dekhenge :p Pr chill hai...mene bhot tang kiya tumhe(volley girls) ko...meetings kr krke...pr in the end it was all worth it :) I still credit your 4th position to me :p :) Fir finally I thought ki mene tumse position niklva li aur mene badla le liya. Now, I was satisfied. ki mene tujhe fraud maarne nhi diya. XD I won XD.
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
PART 2
YoYo Neha!!
As you might have read my Part-1, we covered uptil the 2019 InterIIT part of the story. Then in 2020 start.. a lot happened. Both with me as well as suraj :) We both were excited with our new journeys. I was happy for Suraj, but sad as well. I was somehow convincing myself ki chlo koi ni... chill hai. Suraj ki life hai, let him destroy as he wish to XD. Pr nahi... honestly, I was a little bit taken aback when I heard from suraj ki you took the first step. This was the start of my perspective changing. As expected you were too shy to interact with us, so me and suraj decided to go to a double date :p It was a nice experience. I got to know you a little...you were sometimes a bit savage at comments. Maybe that's why in the library it hit me hard. Maybe that's how you are. Some perspective changing..Now I was atleast not sad for Suraj. Then, 2020, Covid-hit everyone came home summers aise hi nikal gyi... and fir one day...Suraj told me ki neha bhi dual krri hai. That was the point, jahan pe I had to decide. Either take things the hard way, or easy way XD Finally decided to take one more chance :p This time, I was very careful, with 0 expectations, or even worse. I somehow started talking to you. I was glad ki you were not like 2nd year. You also maybe changed a bit. Or maybe this time you had no other choice(at one point, i thought u will be just using me and ditch me at your will) :p but luckily nothing like that happened. We somehow managed to get along in our 7th semester. Though I maintained a little distance from you. Controlling myself to tell where you're wrong :p Then the next 8th sem was also similar... kaam tk ki hi baat krte the. No suggestions, no interventions. If you are expecting ki teri tareef aane vaali hai jld hi... toh sorry, to disappoint you. This is a real life-story :) What I realised in this past one year of spending with you professionally is that.. you're a bit different. You're not like the normal girls I've met. You have a very fixed bubble around you, in which very few people are allowed. That too, upto a limit. Maybe it has something to do with your past. You sometimes are so mean and rude, jaise kahan se aagyi yeh gawaar..no manners or courtesy....but then next moment you are very generous, as if you're an angel god has sent to help me. You are defintely an introvert. You are very hard-working and sincere. But somehow, you don't get what you deserve. I strongly believe it has something to do with your attitude towards your surrounding and towards life. You're a very smart girl, no doubt in that. You want to tread you life's pathway your own way, I respect that. Many times I tried correcting you, but you gave so cold replies ki mujhe voh 2nd year vaali Neha yaad aajati hai XD. That's why I don't tell you now, if I feel there's something you're doing wrongly. I believe it's the responsibility of every friend, but it's okay. You're different. Our friendship is different. And yes ofc, I consider you as my friend yrr... If you'll ever ask for my help, I don't think I'll be able to say No to you. But your ego won't let you ask help from me :) Cheers buddy :) No hard feelings :) Since you asked for a honest memoir. Here it is! Also, since you have been told most of these things...pr i thought i'd tell you everything from start. I'd prefer to say all this over a daaru party, but I think it is highly unlikely now :) I pray for your happiness in future :) Keep working hard :) God will reward you big someday :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Meri pyaari Rajjo
Mujhe aaj bhi yaad hai tera voh first year ka bhola sa chehra, sehme hue, chup chap rehna. aur aaj dekho bc...saamne khada hua aadmi darr jae. khair... mera tera pehla interaction mujhe nhi yaad aara kab hua tha... pr teri image mere dimaag mein shuru se hi ek bhot hi mehnati ladke ki rahi hai. tere se bhot log motivation lete the sach mein. chahe results nhi aate the...padhai ho ya sports...pr tune kabhi koshish krna nhi chodha. This is the thing I love you mostly for. voh kehte hain naa... "haraa vahi jo kabhi ladaa nhi"... meri nazron mein asli vijeta tu hi hai meri rajjo. baaki bakchodiyiantoh bhot ki...mostly class/exam jaate time ek doosre ki cycle peeche baithke jaana. bhale hi kuch smjh na aaye... pr class jaana ni chodna. bhai. again. You're the god of dedication. yrr tere baare mein kuch bura hai hi nhi bolne ko bc. yeh toh sab acha acha hogya. haan yaad aaya bc mc. itni body shody banayi hai...kabhi istemaal bhi krlena zindagi mein. vrna kya hi fayda. you know what i'm referring to :)
chal bs ab bhot hogya. finally let's end it on a bad note stated above. Adios my champ :) I love you :* always and forever :*

P.S. mujhe pata hai tu mere ilawa kisiko apne mess ke extras choone bhi nhi deta tha XD
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
My rajjo(2)...
tera first impression on me was like a patla sa sukka sa ladka, jismein infinte gussa bhara padha hai. choote hi foot padega XD pr dheere dheere i got to know your soft side. dil se saaf hai re tu :) isiliye log fayda utha jaate hain meri bechari rajjo ka. isse yaad aaya voh fraud bc. bhai bhai bhai... chappalein ghissa di thi sirf uski complaint krte krte. mujhe toh khushi bss iss baat ki thi ki tu merepe itna itna bharosa krra tha. hassi bhi aati thi mujhe kabhi kabhi. mein uss time zindgi mein pehli baar thhane gya tha XD. meri khud fati padi thi tb toh XD pr chlo koi na...gltiyon se hi seekhta hai insaan :) aur tere jugaad..choti se choti chiz ke liye. XD. 
itne dhokhe kha kha ke...IAS hi banna be... vahi suit krta hai tujhe aur teri personality ko :)
aur bc agr IAS banne ke baad 1cr. -2cr. jo dahej batata tha tu...agr 1 rupaya bhi liya toh gaand maardunga bc. 
aur IAS bannke bhul matt jaana. apni gun ka "all india" license banwane mein tere paas hi aaunga XDXD
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text: Thanks Ratnesh, memoir likhen ke liye :):) Although humari kabhi jyada baat nhi hui...pr sahi hai...kya pata aage milna likha ho apna zindagi mein, and this is just the start :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Batra!!
Pata, you're one of iitk batchmates jisse mein motivation leta hun aaj bhi. You're so humble, ki lgta hi ni hai mein kisi god se baat krra hun :p Upar se...jo tune goal maara tha mujhe katake 2nd year mein...bhai!! voh toh dilpe chott lagi thi. ekdum gehri!! tbse mene tujhe god maan liya tha :p pr chill hai...it only motivated me to practice harder. Abhi last dinon mein thoda aur jyada khelte saath mein toh shyd mujhe mauka mil jaata badla lene ka :p Aquatics, Badminton mein toh kya hi kehne aapke :) Sahi hai yrr... bss aise hi khelte koodte rehna. Naukri, paisa apni jagah...but apne khelne ke shaunk ko matt mrne dena :) I'm sure wherever you are, be it singapore or somewhere else, you'll find a way to play :) Cheers yr!!
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Gupta ji...
Jaise ki baaki memoirs ne aapko already kaafi galiya diya hai treat na dene ke paap mein...mein iske viprit jaake, aapko dhanyawaad kehna chahunga...meri bday treat mein contribute krne ke liye XDXD. shyd mein akela aisa insaan hu iss dharti pe...jisne aapki jaeb se paise niklwaye voh bhi apni treat ke liye XD. pr khair...jaane dijiye..voh bhule hue pall..aap kaafi bade manushyein bann skte hain...agr aap apne paapon ka pashchyatap krein. iske liye jb hum aapke shehar aayenge, tb aapko humari khoob ache se sewa-paani krna hoga. aapke saare paap dhull jayenge. jald hi aate hain hum aapke sheher. 
Aapke,
Jaspreet
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
kaafi coool and calm....this was your first impression on me.
itna slow bola that pehli baar ki niind hi aagyi this mujhe XD
pr jo bhi hai...  hai toh tu rocking.
majje krta reh yrr
aur raise hi positive approach rakhe reh
phulo phalo khush raho
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Satyam Boii!!
Meri motivation hai tu padhai krne ke liye!!
Sahi mein yrr...agar abhi padhne laga hun mein toh tujhe dekhke hi...ki itna khelne ka junoon hone ke bawjood padhai ki jaa skti hai. Tu sexy hai yaara...bhot kamm log hote hain duniya mein aise. I'm lucky ki mein tujhe mila aur jaana :) Bhai aise hi hasste khelte rehna. Bss ek hi dua hai meri ki bss tu maggu naa bann jaana :) ki naukri naukri naukri bss...paise vgera ki toh tension ni.. bs apne andrr ke bachhe ko kabhi matt marrne dena :) Aise hi ghoomte firrte rehna...accident krte rehna :P poori duniya ghoom daal bc!! Kya pata mein bhi mil jaun raaste mein ;)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
ek toh teri cheesy lines... tera hero banna. padhai ke saath saath itni coolness.... kaise manage krte ho :)
aise hi cool rehna. padhai likhayi ke alawa bhi. sehat pe dhyaan dena. football bhi khelte rehna thoda bhot kabhi kabhi. agr koi saath khene ko na mile.. toh mujhe bula lena. 1-2 mhine reh lunga tere aalishan bungalow mein :) jb bore hogya football se... tb bagha diyo. agle saal fir aajunga mein:)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Shivam boii!!
Yrr aaj tk bura lgta hai yrr mujhe DS ka yaad krke :p Mene faswa diya tha tujhe. Pr yrr sach bataun toh...pata nhi kaise mein paas hogya tha uss time course mein. And usmein agar fail hojata...fir toh pata nhi AP hi lag jaati uss saal toh seedha :p Kaafi tough saal tha voh. Toh thanks a lot lot yr <3. Baaki chill hai...ab padhne lag gya hun mein, so fikr not :) First year mein tere aur vakul ko squash ki baatein krte dekhke bhot acha lgta tha...pr tum dono ne hi chodh diya squash baad mein :p..I still miss our first year summer camp though. Agar department se disconnect na hota mein... toh surely tum logon ke saath hi maze krte mein 4 saal :) pr koi ni...in the end sab chill hai :) bss aise hi apni coolness failate rehna :) Best of luck yrr :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text: Mein kuch bhi likhne lagta hun yahan...toh sochta hun tu bc hass rha hoga ki yeh kya nautanki krra hai saala! :D Tu dil ka bhot acha insaan hai...bss itna hero jo banta hai na tu. First InterIIT mein toh bc seh liya tha kisi tarah...pr second mein toh ladai ho hi gyi na chahte hue bhi :p Pr vahi...tu dil ka acha insaan hai..toh 2 mhine baad mere election mein poora kaam bhi tu hi kiya <3 Bhale hi kitna hi laddlein..pr tu bc hasske jo harr baat ko taal deta tha...vohi seekha mene terese. Fir smjha tu thoda alag hai bss. Pata sirf tu hi ek aisa insaan hota tha jo canteen mein apni maggi share krdeta tha bina irritate hue :p Jyada nhi bolunga fir tu kahega bc itna vehla hai yeh pagal insaan :p Bss dua hi krunga ki tujhe bhagwaan khoob tarrakki de!! bc shubhankar shubhankar hojaye poori duniya mein. May you reach the top of jo bhi tu krna chahta hai :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Meri Kutiya...
Mujhe behad khushi hai ki mene tumhara yeh naam rakhwaya. Jinn logon ko yeh nhi pata... toh 1st year ragging mein, Hall-3 RR mein, mene iss cute se, pyaare se puppy ke saath doggystyle krke isko puppy se kutiya banaya tha. Hence, the name. bss tbse humara rishta bhot hi cute sa raha hai. mene apni kutiya ka hmesha dhyaan rakha hai. khairr... yrr tu bhot hi cute aur sweet hai. probably the only person i know apart from baba, with no haters. tera aise hi randomly room mein aake baith jaana...baatein krna..i'll never forget. bss aise hi hasste khelte rehna. Aur apne papaji ko mera namaskar kehna. unko mere marnne ki agr do din pehle khabar mile toh mujhe bata dena pls XD. Aur kutiya, agr tujhe kabhi koi bhi kuch bhi kahe, you know my number :p chalo take care. Best wishes yr, for your journey ahead :)
Adios :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
my baby doll...
tere saath toh 1sst year se leke 4th year tk bhot memories hain....
pata shyd, you're the only one jisse mein 4on saal tk connected rha. vikky navin ke ilawa(department boiis). 
there aur neha ke chutiyape sunna. fir strategy banana aur discuss krna ki mere bday pe yeh kiya usne, apne bday pe mera gift ni liya :p haan...mostly yhi memories hain.

iske alawa... harr bakchodi mein saath hi hote the Japan... bhale hi wig mein kisi ka bday ho ya baap treat ho :) aur bhaaiiii.... jo badlaav dekha mene tujhmein... 1st year se 4th yeear tk... it's commendable :p

choti choti baaton pe gussa krna vese abhi bhi poori tarah ni choda tune... pr kaafi improved hai. kaafi :) yaad hai first year ki apni baat... teri looks aur meri baatein (deadly combination):p pr chal ab toh mein kaafi sexy hogya hun... i've become self-sufficient :)

pr yrr... kuch bhi ho... hmesha connected rehna yr. koi ladki humari dosti ke beech ni aani chahie :p mein milne aata rhunga :*
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text: Meri photo kahan hai??? :(
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
tushyyyyyyyy....
yrr last ke 2 mhine mein i felt... apan bhot late mile yrr...
apne kaafi interest match krte the yrr... pr chill hai. abhi konsa tu marr rha hai bc.
mein milne aata rhunga tujhe. don't worry
mera plan hai.. mein harr saal india ka tour kiya krunga. sabse milke aaya krunga :)
tu bhi kabhi kabhi call krte rehna. touch mein rehna. 
You'll not leave social media i know. toh jb bhi tu social media handle switch kre, jispe tu active rehta hai... say jaise abhi tu snapchat pe active hai. kabhi instagram pe switch kre...toh mujhe batake krna. Proomise :) mein bhi batake krunga. this way we'll keep in touch :)
chlo yahan pe mera show khtm hua... milte hain jl hi :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Tushy Tushy Tushy...
You are the definition of "change":) bhai kya se kya hogya tu sirf lockdown mein. fan hogya yrr mein tera <3. 1st year se 3rd year tk mein tujhe itna nhi jaan paaya jitna last ke 2 mhinon mein jaan gya. itni jldi itna badhiya bond bann gya terese. Kaafi similarities bhi nikal ke aayin....Jaise how we wanted our graduation college to be :D terese jyada energetic banda ni tha inn aakhri 2 mhinon mein koi bhi<3 be like that always :) dedicated toh tu bhot hai...tabhi itne lambe time coding aur gym krke itna badiya perform kr paaya. aise hi full on energy rehna yrr hmesha. kabhi voh pehle jaisa lethargic tushar dikha mujhe toh gaand maar dunga mein. aur milte rhenge apan toh....tension na le. jahan bhi tu reh rha hoga...vahan kabhi bhi, kitne bhi dino ke liye aake rehne mein ab mujhe koi sharam nhi. aise hi apne hardwork se chaapte rehna. BOOYAHH!!
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
bc.. saale... bhadwe.
itni bakchodi bio mein
tinder ni hai yeh bsdk
tere liye kya hi memior lihun...
ghar aake pitt ta rhunga bss tujhe
ek hi regret hai yrr bss mujhe... usska udhar mein zindagi bhar ni chuka paunga tujeh :(
mauj mein reh... IAS ki tyaari krni ho jab.. tab mujhe bhi bula lena...dono job chodhke yeh bhi ek baar try krenge bc
I love You :*
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Mera Babu...
First of all...agr koi baba ko nhi jaanta, aur yeh memoir padh rha hai, toh tum 'duniya ka sabse perfect friend that a human can possibly get' miss krre ho. Baba is the only person jiska marte damm tk koi hater ni hoga. baba actually koi tera bura kr hi ni skta. chorr bhi tere ghar aayega, toh tu usko bhi enlighten krke vapas bhejega. baba you are like an open book to me...I kept on looking more and more phases of you...and keeps on liking you more and more. I remember 1st mein i've liked your witty comments always. poora group kahin baitha hua hai...toh usmein bakchod se comments maar ke sabki gaand maarne vaala, maze dilwane vaala was you. 2nd year mein..wing mein kisiko koi bhi dikkat honi, usko pyaar se sunna aur smjhane vaala was you. Apne saath saath wing ko bhi bhagwan se jodne vaala(chahe thoda bhot hi sahi) was you. harr ek bande ka go-to guy was you. 1st year se leke end tk wing ko jode rakhne vaala was you. hagge ke uss taraf vaale pakistani logon ko mujhse milwane ka credit bhi mein aapko hi dena chahunga. Selflessness baba mene sach mein terese seekhi. itna self-less kaie ho skta hai insaan.

Abhi mein tujhe bhagwan ka avatar bolne vaala tha...pr fir teri kamiyian yaad aayin. itni badi kuch ni hai...bss choti choti 2 cheezein. tu apni diet aur fitness ki bilkul ekdum maa chodke rakhta hai. agr yeh dono sahi krle na tu...bhai 'perfect human being' banne se koi ni rokk skta tujhe. smart, hardworking, good looking, cool etc. etc. sab hai...bss what you lack is discipline and control on your body. iska dhyaan rakha kr yr...poore wing ki jaan hai tu <3. 

Aur milne toh aata rhunga mein terese...kbhi kangaal vgera hokr.. sabki thokerein khaake...mein jb darwaza dhundhta hua aaunga toh mujhe pata hai sirf tu hi rakhega mujhe :) I'm so lucky that I met you babu :) I love you a lot :* :* take care apna aur apni body ka :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text: Mittal Sir OP!! I remember when we first met in our wing via pubg :D first year toh kitna pubg khela yrr... aur fir bss padhai padhai padhai :) but you're cool dude. a lot helping, kind-hearted and dedicated :) keep smiling your million dollar smile :) haste khelte rho aur savasth rho :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh

text:
Hi Yashika!
I'm your admirer since our 1st year. I always thought you're more or less like me but never got a chance to meet you. I thought ki 4 saal mein kabhi toh mil hi lenge, pr time just flied. Anyways, best wishes for your future journey :)
author: Jaspreet  Singh
